body_html: Hi, including anything TH in C++ extensions is unsupported. TH is a very low level backend in Pytorch and anything can be deleted or broken any day. It's not part of ATen's public API and therefore also not part of the C++ extension API. You can find a way to hack it yourself but otherwise this is a won'tfix from us. Sorry!
body_text: Hi, including anything TH in C++ extensions is unsupported. TH is a very low level backend in Pytorch and anything can be deleted or broken any day. It's not part of ATen's public API and therefore also not part of the C++ extension API. You can find a way to hack it yourself but otherwise this is a won'tfix from us. Sorry!
body: Hi, including anything TH in C++ extensions is unsupported. TH is a very low level backend in Pytorch and anything can be deleted or broken any day. It's not part of ATen's public API and therefore also not part of the C++ extension API. You can find a way to hack it yourself but otherwise this is a won'tfix from us. Sorry!
